job_description: You will be a member of the above group, which is responsible for: Telecom for power system applications, incl. Fiber-opticsPower System Telecom Database Your job duties may include:To assist the senior database staff with updates/changes to the Granite, Network Engineer and other telecom asset databasesAssist in revising drawingsAnalysis for Power System Telecom equipment/network/systemsGPR (Ground Potential Rise) Studies and PLC (Power Line Carrier) modellingPrepare training documentation This job will provide you with the following professional development:Knowledge of Telecom for power systemTelecom asset/inventory data basesMeridian drawing data base.
